sentences.cn: 诚实的人是值得尊敬的.

sentences.en: Cautiously, he moved himself into an upright position.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼地直起了身子。

sentences.en: He was a good honest upright man.
sentences.cn: 他是位诚实、正直的好人。

sentences.en: He was handsome, upright and chivalrous.
sentences.cn: 他长相英俊，为人正直，风度翩翩。

sentences.en: He was sitting on an upright chair beside his bed, reading.
sentences.cn: 他正坐在床前一张直背椅上看书。

sentences.en: Helen sat upright in her chair.
sentences.cn: 海伦笔直地坐在椅子上。

sentences.en: Jerrold pulled himself upright on the bed.
sentences.cn: 杰罗尔德从床上坐了起来。

sentences.en: Katie was still awake, sitting bolt upright(= sitting with her back very straight ) staring at the television.
sentences.cn: 凯蒂还醒着，坐得笔直，眼睛盯着电视。

sentences.en: Moira sat stiffly upright in her straight-backed chair.
sentences.cn: 莫伊拉直挺挺地坐在她的直背靠椅上。

sentences.en: Sit in a relaxed upright posture.
These upright stones are the vestiges of some ancient religion.
sentences.cn: 这些竖立的石头是某种古代宗教的遗迹.

sentences.en: When one is surrounded by the virtuous, he'll become upright himself.
sentences.cn: 蓬生麻中, 不扶自直.

sentences.en: When she heard the news, she jerked upright in surprise.
sentences.cn: 当听到这则消息时, 她惊讶得跳了起来.

sentences.en: With a swift movement, Matthew Jerrold sat upright.
sentences.cn: 马修·杰罗尔德迅速坐直了。

sentences.en: You imagine being on a bicycle or motorbike; you go around the corner, you lean into the corner, which remains perfectly upright in physics.
sentences.cn: 想象一下骑着自行车和摩托车走在拐弯处时，你朝着拐角处倾斜，这在物理上仍然保持了完全笔直。

sentences.en: Your seat should be in the upright position when the plane is landing.
sentences.cn: 飞机降落时应调直座椅靠背。
